title: Compute median age of youngest child in household

content.prompt:
A random sample of 25 households from the Mountainview School District was surveyed. In this survey, data were collected on the age of the youngest child living in each household. The histogram below displays the data collected in the survey.

In which of the following intervals is the median of these data located?

choices.label: 0 years old to less than 2 years old
4 years old to less than 6 years old
6 years old to less than 8 years old
8 years old to less than 10 years old
10 years old to less than 12 years old

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
